name: AnswerGrid
long_description:
AnswerGrid is an AI-powered web research tool realised as a spreadsheet. For our first research problem, we’re helping founders discover the 30 most relevant leads worth the investment of manual outbound every day.

Both co-founders (Noah and Bolu) have led the development of mission-critical software during their time at Palantir. Noah, as a Tech Lead working on platform security infrastructure used on the company’s largest contracts (incl. the UK's NHS and the US Gov), and Bolu, as a Tech Lead on the contract-winning team behind the company's largest engagement in South Korea.
